Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Collection Freestanding Induction Range with 5 Elements, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity (Burgundy) - VUFSIE365BU
Variant HTML:
Stylish and functional, the 36-inch Verona Ultima Collection Induction Range is perfect for any kitchen. It has an angled stainless-steel handle and a digital clock and timer, among other elegant details. The cooktop has 5 induction elements, 2 of which can be used as bridges, and the oven has dual convection fans to ensure even heating.

Home Cooking Amenities:

  • 5 Zones for Induction
  • Both sides of the Smart Zone can be bridged, and it has a power boost of 3700W and a measurement of 4.5" when not connected and 9.75" when connected.
  • The inner zone is 5" and the dual zone is 9 7/8"; the power boost ratings are 3000/5500W and 1850/2600W, respectively.
  • Glass and ceramic cooktop surface in black
  • Cast-Iron Griddle Inclusive


Kitchen Appliances:

  • A 5.0 cu. ft. (30"W x 16"D x 15.5"H) cube
  • Two-Fan Convection System
  • European Warm Front
  • Broiler Part - Entire Width, With Door Closed
  • 3000W Power for the Broiler
  • Features (Defrost, Pizza, Bottom Bake, Top Bake, Broil, Maxi Broil, Convection Bake, Convection Broil),
  • Soft-Close with Three-Pane Detachable Glass Door for Ovens
  • Package of 4 Lighted LED Oven Spoons
  • Interior catalytic panels and easy-to-clean enamel
  • 1-regular, height-adjustable rack
  • 2 - maintain a stationary position while gliding
  • 1-shelf that saves space
  • 1-tray for air-frying
  • one - assembly of the broiler pan


Extra Functions:

  • Control via Touch and Timer Programmability
  • Handle Made of Anangled Stainless Steel
  • Round, Comfortable Control Knobs in Chrome
  • Wide-Bottom Drawer for Organizing
  • 50 A dedicated circuit that operates on 120/240 V at 60 Hz
  • policy-compliant parts and labor for two years


Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Drawer with Full Width for Storage
    • Helps maintain a neat and orderly kitchen by providing a place to store cookware.
  • 5 cubic feet of oven space
    • Ideal for large gatherings or family dinners, the oven's 5.0 cu. ft. capacity allows you to cook a variety of dishes at once.
  • Hands-Free Clock
    • The touch control clock makes perfect timing in the kitchen a breeze with its easy-to-read display and straightforward interface.
  • Clean Enamel with Ease
    • Cleaning is a breeze thanks to the smooth enamel interior.
  • Includes 5 Induction Zones and a Griddler
    • Five induction zones and a griddle allow for precise and efficient cooking, and the range is very versatile.
  • Soft-Touch Round Knob
    • The ergonomically shaped, round soft-touch knob makes adjusting the settings a breeze.
  • Two-Fan Convection System
    • The use of two convection fans guarantees uniform heat distribution and quicker cooking times, so your food will always turn out perfectly cooked.
